sentence.Network_en: The carpet is worn but still serviceable.
Passports are frequently serviceable in proving the identity of the traveller.
sentence.Network_cn: 护照往往可用来证明旅行者的身份.

sentence.Network_en: When this building is repaired, it will be serviceable.
sentence.Network_cn: 这栋楼房修好后还可以住.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... serried 密集的 serviceable 可用的，耐用的 servile 奴性的，百依百顺的.
得的多音字组词_百度知道 ... 得闲〖 befree;beatleasure〗 得心应手〖 serviceable;handy;haveeverythingunderone'sperfectcontrol〗.
...团的推动是制度变迁的动力，是技术进步决定和引致了制度变迁。在他看来，技术在社会变化过程中是关键性的“有用的（serviceable）”工具性质的因素，它于制度这种“无用的（unserviceable）”仪式性的因素相比，具有决定性的.
serviceable time 可使用时间serviceable 有用的耐用的serviceline 日用管路

list.abs: 6. 预计2012年底，创友将走出深圳，开设驻外第一家商务中心…..我们秉承服务、共赢、发展的理念，不断的积累并前进，相信有你的加入，创友的发展将更加精彩。2四大宗旨1. 服务（service）
六是售后服务（Service），该市场建立有完善的主动售后服务体系，主动为客户提供专业贴心的产品售后质量跟踪服务。　　如今的长 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'willing to be of service'): from Old French servisable, from servise (see service)

entry.tran: 可用的;够用的;性能良好的
entry.def: If you describe something as serviceable, you mean that it is good enough to be used and to perform its function.

example.ex: His Arabic was not as good as his English, but serviceable enough...
example.tran: 他的阿拉伯语没有他的英语好，但是够用了。

example.ex: A customer took a perfectly serviceable washing machine in for repair, only to be told it needed replacing.
example.tran: 一位顾客带着一台性能尚好的洗衣机来修，不料竟被告知该换洗衣机了。

means.word_mean: 1. ready for service or able to give long service;
3. intended or able to serve a purpose without elaboration;

auth_sentence.content: It was damp, filthy and lacked a serviceable kitchen.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was damp, filthy and lacked a serviceable kitchen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was damp, filthy and lacked a serviceable kitchen.

auth_sentence.content: It was a...mishmash of the parts that were still serviceable.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a...mishmash of the parts that were still serviceable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a...mishmash of the parts that were still serviceable.

auth_sentence.content: The storekeeper...one of the most serviceable of men.
auth_sentence.res_content: The storekeeper...one of the most serviceable of men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The storekeeper...one of the most serviceable of men.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奴隶状态,惩役,地役权,使用权
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+itude状态→服务的状态→奴隶状态,惩役
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存
de加强+serv服务+e→加强服务→值得[重视]
dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害

stems_affixes.value_cn: 观察,观测,注意到,监视,遵守,评述,说
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强动作+serv保持+e→一直保持→遵守,引申为观察
pre预先+serv保留+e→预先保留→保存
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修
